CooldownLimitInfo: Note: The cooldown of a spell cannot be reduced to less than 50% of its base cooldown by any means.

LongInfoPerLevel.0:
If an attack (except with agony damage) were to kill you but the overkill damage amounts to less than 20%/25%/30% of your maximum hit points, you will heal yourself for 20%/25%/30% of your maximum hit points. Only after that is the damage applied.
In addition, all your spell cooldowns are reduced by 60 seconds.

Cooldown: 30h/20h/10h
The cooldown is only reduced while the character has a battle sign.

LargePerkInfos.ExtraDamageHealingInfo:
Unlocked Revelation Perks grant a bonus to all damage and healing:
  • Stage 1 grants a bonus of +4 damage and healing
  • Stage 2 increases this bonus to +9
  • Stage 3 increases this bonus to +20
LargePerkInfos.GeneralInfo:
To unlock a Revelation Perk, you need to distribute promotion points in the corresponding domain.
To unlock stage 1 of a Revelation Perk, you need 250 promotion points. Stage 2 requires 500 promotion points. As soon as you have distributed 1000 promotion points, stage 3 is unlocked.
Revelation Mastery, which can be found on some gems, provides additional points to unlock Revelation Perks.

Unlocked Revelation Perks grant a bonus to all damage and healing:
  • Stage 1 grants a bonus of +4 damage and healing
  • Stage 2 increases this bonus to +9
  • Stage 3 increases this bonus to +20

While wielding a bow your attacks and spells treat the targets physical and holy sensitivity as being 2% higher.

7.Name: Weapon Skill Boost

8.LongInfo:
Gain +6 shielding and +1 sword/axe/club fighting when 5 creatures are on adjacent squares.
For each additional creature, up to a maximum of 8, you get +6 shielding and +1 sword/axe/club fighting more.
8.Name: Battle Instinct

9.LongInfo: For each creature challenged, you will heal yourself for a small amount. This amount scales with your shielding skill. Heals for double the amount if you have less than 60% of your hit points and triple the amount if you have less than 30% of your hit points.
9.Name: Battle Healing

MediumPerkInfos.AugGeneralInfo:
The Conviction Perk is unlocked when the maximum number of promotion points for this slice has been assigned.

There are always two identical Augmentations within the Wheel of Destiny. Regardless of the order of unlocking, bonus I will always be available before bonus II.
MediumPerkInfos.GeneralInfo:
The Conviction Perk is unlocked when the maximum number of promotion points for this slice has been assigned.

Most Conviction Perks can be found more than once within the Wheel of Destiny. When they are unlocked, their effect adds up.

VesselInfos.GemInfo:
Gems can be revealed within the Gem Atelier. Different gem qualities yield different amounts of mods:
  • Lesser gem: one basic mod
  • Regular gem: two basic mods
  • Greater gem: two basic mods and one supreme mod
You can enhance the effects of a mod by increasing its grade in the Fragment Workshop.
VesselInfos.MomentumTooltip: Increasing the mod grade of cooldown augmentations does not further reduce the cooldown of spells, but adds a chance to gain Momentum that is additive to other chances of gaining Momentum.
VesselInfos.VesselInfo:
If the Vessel Resonance matches the gem quality in this domain, a bonus of +1 to all damage and healing is granted. This bonus is increased by 1 for greater gems.

Regardless of the match, gems will always grant mod bonuses based on the Vessel Resonance.
  • Lesser gems match Dormant Vessels (VR I)
  • Regular gems match Awakened Vessels (VR II)
  • Greater gems match Radiant Vessels (VR III)
